author: newsr.in
title: FIFA 16 Shows Ratings for Ten New Players, Including Diego Costa, de Gea, Bale, More
text: With FIFA 16 just three weeks away from launch, EA Sports is continuing to give gamers a look at the ratings for the most important players that will be included in the simulation, giving them a chance to decide which team they plan to use. According to the official site, the rundown from 30 to 21 includes: 21. Giorgio Chiellini - Juventus 22. Robert Lewandowski ... Â»
